info.description:
API definition for COVID Vaccination

 | FHIR Implementation Guide | Version |
 |-----|-----|
 |[ukcore.release1.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/hl7fhirukcorer4release1/home)||
 |[uk.nhsdigital.r4.test](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home)||

tags.name: Immunization
tags.description:
Describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccine or a record of an immunization as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.

 Profile (constraints): [NHSDigital-Immunization](https://simplifier.net/guide/NHSDigital/Home/FHIRAssets/AllAssets/Profiles/NHSDigital-Immunization.guide.md)

get.summary: server-capabilities: Fetch the server FHIR CapabilityStatement

example.value: Number"},{"name":"procedure-code:below","definition":"https://fhir.nhs.uk/SearchParameter/immunization-procedure-code","type":"token","documentation":"Search in UKCore procedure code extension"},{"name":"_include","type":"special","documentation":"Include referenced resources"}]}]}]}

get.description:
[search](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html) for Immunization instances.

 **Required Parameters** 

 One of the following search paramter combinations is **required** 

| Required | Optional | 
|----------|---------| 
| patient.identifier+procedure-code:below+_include|  |

parameters.name: patient.identifier
parameters.description:
NHS Number

 Chained search parameter. Please see [chained](http://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#chaining)

 | Name |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | patient |   Immunization.patient | 


 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Patient.identifier |

parameters.name: procedure-code:below
parameters.description:
Search in UKCore procedure code extension

 | Type |  Expression | 
 |--------|--------| 
 | [token ](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#token)|  Immunization.extension.where(url='https://fhir.hl7.org.uk/StructureDefinition/Extension-UKCore-VaccinationProcedure').valueCodeableConcept |

parameters.name: _include
parameters.description:
Include referenced resources

 Caution: This does not appear to be a valid search parameter. **Please check HL7 FHIR conformance.**

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description:
An [OAuth 2.0 bearer token](https://digital.nhs.uk/developer/guides-and-documentation/security-and-authorisation#user-restricted-apis).

Required in all environments except sandbox.

parameters.name: NHSD-Session-URID
parameters.description: The user role ID (URID) for the current session. Also known as a user role profile ID (URPID).

parameters.name: X-Request-ID
parameters.description: A globally unique identifier (GUID) for the request, which we use to de-duplicate repeated requests and to trace the request if you contact our helpdesk

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: An optional ID which you can use to track transactions across multiple systems. It can have any value, but we recommend avoiding `.` characters.
